thread.title: Ranger Energy Services, Inc. Announces Date for Fourth Quarter 2017 Earnings Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Ranger Energy Services, Inc. Announces Date for Fourth Quarter 2017 Earnings Conference Call
text:
HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Ranger Energy Services, Inc. (NYSE:RNGR) (the "Company") will report fourth quarter 2017 financial and operating results after the market closes for trading on March 6, 2018. Following the announcement, the Company's management will host a fourth quarter 2017 earnings conference call the morning of March 7, 2018 at 10:00 a.m. Eastern time (9:00 a.m. Central time).
Interested parties are invited to participate on the call by dialing 1-866-807-9684, or 1-412-317-5415 for international calls, (request to join the Ranger Energy Services call) or via the Company's website at www.rangerenergy.com . A replay of the conference call will be available following the call and can be accessed from www.rangerenergy.com .
About Ranger Energy Services, Inc.
Ranger Energy Services, Inc. is an independent provider of well service rigs and associated services in the United States, with a focus on unconventional horizontal well completion and production operations.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180221006546/en/
Ranger Energy Services, Inc.
